Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: Westbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier minor fire on the tracks near Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier minor fire on the tracks near Cicero.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
